name: MARGINS
description: Stores data for College of American Pathologists (CAP) synoptic form field Assessment of margins.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the result record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: MARGINS_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Assessment of margins.
entries: Tumor present at surgical margin of optic nerve
Margin involvement by tumor not identified
Sarcoma involvement of margins not identified
Margins uninvolved by carcinoma in situ
Margins involved by carcinoma in situ
